title: Kain Panjang (long Sarong), late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
description: A long sarong (kain panjang) with varied diagonal stripe ("garis miring") pattern in brown. Diagonals show different patterns within the stripes, some of which are repeated.

tombstone.epitaph:
Kain Panjang (long Sarong), late 19th–early 20th century.Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. 1962-110-1.
